bio: Hello! My name is Dylan, and I'm the ECSA President for the 2014/2015 academic year. I'm entering my fifth year of undergrad studying Computing Science, and have been living in ECV for the past two years. Some random things I enjoy include dodgeball, ping pong, badminton, Super Smash Bros, Guitar Hero, piano, and spicy food. Don't hesitate to contact me if you have any questions about anything!

Hello! My name is Cody, and I'm the ECSA VP Communication for this 2014/2015 academic year. I am currently in the middle of an internship working towards a BSc Specialization in Computer Science, entering into year 5. Some of my hobbies include dodgeball, ping pong, pool, League of Legends, and most things computer. Feel free to contact me about anything at anytime.
